abstract: University of North Carolina Board of Governors votes unanimously to close three academic centers; critics say move is politically motivated.
lead_paragraph: The closing of the centers, including one run by an outspoken critic of the state’s Republican leadership, set off allegations of partisanship and academic censorship.

headline.main: University of North Carolina Board Closes 3 Centers
headline.print_headline: University of North Carolina Board Closes 3 Centers

snippet: The closing of the centers, including one run by an outspoken critic of the state’s Republican leadership, set off allegations of partisanship and academic censorship.
